loans.use: to purchase some livestock and increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
To generate income, Trinidad has operated a variety store business within her community for several years. Aged 53, she lives in Intramuros, Manila in the Philippines and is blessed with three children. Her husband, Antonio, helps her in their business and they work hand-in-hand to provide for their needs.

Trinidad wants to establish another business to earn a more profitable and higher income. This time she wants to invest in a school supplies shop. For this reason, she would like to take out a loan of 30,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy school supplies such as pencils, notebooks, pads, paper, etc. to sell. This is considered a good decision as the school period is drawing near again in the Philippines. Being a kind and friendly mother, Trinidad is hoping that she will further improve the business through this financial assistance.

Trinidad hopes that her business will expand in due time and be successful. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and there she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God that she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy school supplies such as pencils, notebooks, pads, paper, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Anarjan

texts.ru: Анаржан успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве у Анаржан на сегодняшний день лошадь, 4 коровы, 10 овец. На 2,0 Га земли она выращивает экологически чистую фасоль. Анаржан получает ежемесячную прибыль от бизнеса в сумме около 30,000 сом (KGS). В целях увеличения своего хозяйства, Анаржан обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 105,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошади и 1,000 кг. удобрений для обработки почвы. На доходы от кредита Анаржан планирует построить сараи для скота и приобрести дополнительный земельный участок.
texts.en: Anarjan successfully repaid her previous loan, after using it for its intended purpose.  She is very thankful to Kiva and to all the lenders who helped her to obtain this financing.  Anarjan currently has one horse, four cows, and 10 sheep on her farm.  She also grows organic beans on two hectares of land.  Thanks to her business, she makes an income of about 30,000 som (KGS) per month.  In order to expand her activity, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 105,000 som (KGS) to buy one horse as well as 1,000 kilos of fertilizers to prepare her land.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to build a barn for her livestock and to purchase another plot of land.

loans.use: To buy one horse as well as fertilizers to cultivate her land and grow organic beans.

loans.name: Rosalba Amparo

texts.es:
Rosalba una mujer que comparte su hogar con su pareja con quien tiene un hijo de 11 años de edad hoy pie tu ayuda y la necesita para comprar surtido, empezó un negocio de venta de paletas en el año 2006 que ha servido para mejorar las condiciones en su vivienda, el apoyo lo necesita por diversos motivos y es que debido a la inseguridad en la zona, los gastos principales como alimentación y pago de arriendo no le ha quedado capital para abastecer su negocio y en el momento lo único que tiene para vender es lo que tiene en la nevera, por ello con urgencia quiere recurrir a un préstamo para la abastecer su negocio con paletas más conocidos como “mantecados”.

Tu préstamo ayudara a una empresaria a tener existencia para trabajar, no dejar caer su negocio y seguir brindando esa ayuda tan necesaria en ingresos que brinda a su hogar.
texts.en:
Rosalba is a woman and she is sharing her home with her partner, with whom she has an 11-year old son.

She is asking for your help because she needs to stock up. In 2006, she started a business of selling popsicles. This has improved her quality of life. She needs support due to different reasons and the insecurity in the area. After paying for food and rent, there is no money left for buying stock for her business, and the only thing left to sell is what she has left in the freezer. This is why she urgently needs a loan: to stock up with the most popular popsicles, such as the "mantecado".

The loan will help an entrepreneur with her existence, not to lose her business, and to be able to bring home the dearly needed income.

loans.use: to stock up on popsicles.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Ella es Luz Mary es una mujer casada de 34 años de edad madre de 3 hijos la mujer de 13 y dos hombres de 16 y 10, ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, granos en un negocio tradicional del barrio, trabaja de lunes a domingo 12 horas por día.

Luz Mary desea solicitar un préstamo la razón es que quiere mejorar su negocio, ofreciendo más productos, este capital lo quiere invertir en la compra de un enfriador y productos como carnes frías, quesito, leche, pollo será un plus muy bueno para su negocio, atraerá mayores clientes y sus ingresos se elevaran.

Su deseo es tener buenas ganancias que le soporten una gran inversión que desea hacer para comprar una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Luz Mary is a married woman. She is 34 years old and a mother of three children. Her daughter is 13, and the two boys are 16 and 10.

She is earning a living selling groceries and grains in a traditional neighborhood store. She is working from Monday through Sunday, 12 hours a day.

Luz Mary is requesting a loan because she wants to improve her business, offering more products. She wants to invest the money in buying a cooler and products like cold meat, cheese, milk, and chicken. It will be a great addition to her business, attract more customers and increase her income.

Her wish is to make a good profit, which will help her to make the big investment of buying her own home.

loans.use: to buy a cooler and products, such as cold meat, cheese, milk, and chicken.

loans.name: Leticia Isabel

texts.es:
Leticia es una madre madura, responsable, estricta, amorosa, ella tiene 4 hijos 3 varones de 9, 7, 6 y una mujer de 3 años, vive con su esposo en un hogar que ellos mismos están construyendo, comprando de apoco los materiales e ir modificando parte por parte, sueña que llegue el día en que su hogar este totalmente terminado, su desea es poner piso de cerámica, revocar y pintar las paredes, tener una linda cocina, se enfoca mucho en la educación de sus hijos y en su hogar.

Su esposo es un obrero, ella es comerciante vende calzado en pueblos, en la foto podemos ver algunos de los productos que ella maneja, trata de conservar una línea clásica, elegante y económica para que esté al alcance de personas como ellas que no tiene para comprar unos zapatos muy costosos.

Leticia en el momento está sufriendo el incremento del dólar, le está saliendo costoso comprar le producto pero de momento mantiene los precios, quiere durar un poco a ver si la situación se regula.

Como el calzado ahora está más costoso ella quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de zapatos de todo tipo en cantidades, buscando un mejor precio para continuar ofreciendo sus buenos precios.
texts.en:
Leticia is a mother who is mature, responsible, strict, and loving. She has 4 children- 3 boys, aged 9, 7, 6, and a 3 year old daughter. She lives with her husband in a home they are building themselves, buying materials little by little and modifying it section by section. She dreams of one day having the home be totally finished. She wants to put in a ceramic floor, plaster and paint the walls, and have a nice kitchen. She focuses a lot on her children's education and on her home.

Her husband is a laborer. She is a merchant and she sells shoes in towns. In the photo we can see some of the products that she handles. She tries to keep a classic, elegant, and affordable line that is within reach of people such as those that don't have money for expensive shoes. 

Right now, Leticia is affected by the rise in the dollar and it is expensive for her to buy the products, but so far she has maintained her prices. She wants to last a little longer to see if the situation regulates itself.

Since shoes are more expensive now, she wants to ask for a loan to buy all kinds of shoes in larger quantities, seeking a better price to continue offering her good prices.

loans.use: to buy shoe inventory.

loans.name: Elkin Alexis

texts.es:
Elkin  es un joven de 20 años de edad que impulsado por su deseo de ayudar a su familia inicio un negocio de venta de mercancía, vende productos como accesorios, shampos, tratamientos, juguetes, artículos religiosos, artículos para el hogar entre otros, este negocio ha representado para su familia un gran apoyo pues con la utilidad que g enera complementa el dinero para comprar un alimento o pagar una cuenta de servicios públicos en su hogar.

La idea de Elkin inicialmente es afianzarse, estar bien posicionado y ser competitivo, generar los ingresos suficientes para ayudar a sus padres, luego vender más para pagar sus estudios, hacer crecer su negocio y la meta final con su negocio es comprar una vivienda propia, no quiere estar acostas de sus padres quiere apoyarlos incondicionalmente pero ser independiente es su verdadera meta.

Elkin quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de artículos relacionados con la feria de flores que se está aproximando, invertirá una parte en surtido de juguetes para niños y niñas y el resto en adecuaciones de estanterías.
texts.en:
Elkin is a 20-year-old young man who, driven by his desire to help his family, began a business selling merchandise. He sells products such as accessories, shampoos, treatments, toys, religious objects, household products, and more. This business has represented a major help to his family since with the profit that it generates, it complements the money to purchase food and pay the utility bill in his home. 

Elkin's plan initially is to strengthen it, be well-positioned and competitive, generate sufficient income to help his parents, then sell more to pay for his education, and make his business grow, and his final goal with the business is to purchase his own home. He doesn't want to be living with his parents, he wants to support them unconditionally but being independent is his true goal.

Elkin wants to ask for a loan to purchase items related to the flower festival that is coming up. He will invest a part in an assortment of toys for children and the rest in upgrades to the shelving.

loans.use: to invest a part in an assortment of children's games and the rest in upgrading the shelving.

loans.name: Maria Leonarda

texts.es:
Ella es María una persona que con unas tablas de madera, creatividad y ganas de salir adelante inicio la construcción de una tienda de abarrotes, negocio que empezó en el año 2013, en dos años ha logrado grandes cosas, no solo la ampliación de su negocio, variación de productos, generar un empleo, ha generado confianza y agrado entre sus clientes algo muy importante para que siempre la tengan como primer opción a la hora de realizar una compra.

Ella trabaja por su hogar, por remodelarlo, por tener una condiciones dignas de vida, por su familia, por sus padres, piensa mucho en los demás y trata de con lo poco que gana siempre pensar en sus padres, ayudarles con un mercado, a comprar un droga o simplemente para que tengan un capital si ocurre un imprevisto, aparte de que se encarga de sostener su hogar junto con su  pareja.

María quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de abarrotes, bebidas, cervezas, aguardiente, ron, productos de aseo personal, pañales y granos.
texts.en:
This is María, a person who with some wooden tables, creativity and eagerness to get ahead started building a general store. She started this business in 2013 and in two years she has achieved great things. She hasn't just expanded her business, the product variety, and created employment, she has generated trust and the liking of her customers, something very important for them to always think of her first when they have to buy something. 

She works for her home, to remodel it and have decent living conditions for her family, and her parents. She thinks a lot about others and with what little she earns, she tries, little by little, to think of her parents, to help them with the shopping, buying them medicine, or just for them to have some capital if something unexpected happens. She also supports her home with her spouse. 

María wants to ask for a loan to buy inventory in groceries, beverages, beer, cane liquor, rum, personal hygiene products, diapers and grains.

loans.use: to buy inventory of groceries, beverages, beer, cane liquor, rum, personal hygiene products, diapers and grains

loans.name: Martha Edilma

texts.es:
Humilde, sencilla, cariñosa, trabajadora, paciente son algunas de las cualidades que describen a esta empresaria llamada Martha de 56 años de edad quien es madre de 2 hijos ya mayores y tiene un negocio de tienda de abarrotes, junto a su marido generan los ingresos para su sostenimiento, Martha atiende el negocio 14 horas diarias, dividas en dos turno, ella atiende 7 y esposo las 7 restantes.


Martha quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una vitrina y surtirla con productos de aseo personal, de aseo domestico, pañales y accesorios, esto le permitirá mejorar las ventas, aumentar la utilidad, atraer más clientes, una inversión inteligente que de seguro traerá cambios positivos en su negocio gracias a una línea de venta que podría tener si tu le brindas el apoyo a este par de esposo que trabajan diariamente por vivir en una condiciones dignas.
texts.en:
Humble, simple, loving, hard-working, and patient are some of the qualities that describe this entrepreneur named Martha. She is 56 years old, the mother of 2 adult children, and has a grocery store business. With her husband, they generate the income to support themselves. Martha and her husband tend the store 14 hours each day, divided into two shifts. She works for 7 and her husband works for the other 7. 

Martha wants to ask for a loan to purchase a display case and stock it with personal care products, household cleaners, diapers and accessories. This will allow her to improve her sales, increase the profit and attract more customers. It is an intelligent investment that will surely bring positive changes in her business, thanks a line of sales that she could have if you offer support to this couple who work daily to live in a dignified way.

loans.use: to purchase a display case and stock it with personal care products, household cleaners, diapers and accessories.

loans.name: Morelia Amparo

texts.es:
Ella es Morelia es una mujer de 50 años de edad que toda la vida le ha gustado trabajar como independiente sin ataduras de jefe, manejando su propio tiempo, es una mujer madura, centrada en sus propósitos, tiene un esposo y es madre de dos hijos, no es una persona mantenida tiene su propio negocio de miscelánea donde oferta servicios de fotocopiadora, venta de productos de papelería, cartas decorativas, chocolates y artículos para esos momentos especiales en el cual quieres ganar la sonrisa de un ser amado. 

Morelia trabaja todos los días de la semana 12 horas, se levanta desde temprano, deja la comida lista y el hogar ordenado esa una persona muy organizada que maneja muy bien los tiempos.


Morelia trabaja por la sostenibilidad de su negocio, crecer, tener sucursales, su propósito es operarlo y después de un tiempo pasar esta herencia a uno de sus hijos para que continúe con una labor que ya lleva 8 años de recorrido.

Quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecer su negocio con productos de papelería, tarjetas para fechas especiales, dulces, peluches, vasos con mensajes, llaveros, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
This is Morelia, a 50-year-old woman, who all her life has like to work independently without ties to a boss, managing her own time. She is a mature woman, focused on her goals. She has a husband and is the mother of two children. She is not dependent on anyone, she has her own business selling a variety of things where she offers copy services, and sells paper goods, decorative cards, chocolates, and items for those special moments when you want to get a loved one's smile.

Morelia works 12 hours every day of the week. She gets up early and leaves the food ready and the home orderly. This is a very organized person who manages her time very well. 

Morelia works to sustain her business, grow, have branches; her goal is to operate it and after a time pass the legacy to one of her children so that it continues with a work that has already been going on for 8 years.

She wants to ask for a loan to stock her business with paper goods, cards for special occasions, sweets, stuffed animals, glasses with messages, key chains, and other products.

loans.use: to stock her business with paper good, cards for special occasions, sweets, stuffed animals, glasses with messages, key chains and other products.

loans.name: Luz Neira

texts.es:
Ella es Luz es una madre que se siente muy orgullosa de los logros que ha obtenido hasta el momento, hace 5 años se encontraba en casa solo ejerciendo las labores del hogar y cuidando a su hijo que hoy tiene 11 años de edad, veía como pasaban necesidades porque el dinero que ingresaba su marido n o era suficiente para cubrir los gastos del hogar, pero ella guiada por una idea de iniciar un negocio propio y apoyada por sus conocimientos en panadería decidió prestar algo de capital comprar maquinaria e iniciar la venta de panes, conforme fue pasando el tiempo su negocio iba creciendo, pago las deudas, en su casa las cosas mejoraban y ella quiere ahora dar el siguiente paso, comprar maquinaria para agilizar sus tiempos de producción, producir una mayor cantidades y por ende vender mucho más.

Luz se encuentra solicitando un préstamo que destinara en la totalidad en la compra de una maquina cilindradora, este maquina agilizara los tiempos de producción en su panadería, será un gran apoyo para su labro diaria.
texts.en: This is Luz. She is a mother who feels very proud of the achievements that she has made up until now. 5 years ago she was at home just doing housework and taking care of her son who is 11 years old now. She saw how their needs passed by because the money that her husband made was not sufficient to cover the house expenses. However, being guided by an idea to start her own business and supported by her bakery acquaintances, she decided to borrow some money to buy machinery and start selling breads. As time passed, her business grew, she paid the debt, things improved at home and now she wants to take the next step. She wants to buy a machine to expedite her production times, produce larger quantities and thus sell much more. Luz is asking for a loan that is completely destined to buy a rolling machine. This machine will expedite the production times in her bakery. It will be a great support for her daily work.

loans.use: to buy a rolling machine. This machine will expedite the production times in her bakery.

loans.name: John Harold

texts.es:
Él es John un habitante de Medellín que tiene un bar, que tiene un ambiente ideal para las persona adultas y aquellas que gustan de la música como boleros, música romántica esa de antaño que hacia llorar un corazón.

John trabaja con una empleada, él se encarga de servir las bebidas y atender la caja y ella es una mesera encarga de satisfacer los pedidos de bebidas de los clientes. 

John una vez estuvo casado pero por diferencias con su esposa ahora viven separados no llego a tener hijos y gracias a esto puede centrar todas sus energías y ahorros en un sueño que es tener una vivienda propia, se cansó de pagar arriendo, busca algo seguro, ese cálido hogar en donde pueda llegar cada noche con tranquilidad.

John necesita que su negocio venda más, atraer más personas, realizar eventos, ofrecer buenos precios por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de licores en cantidades para abastecer su negocio, tendrá licores de todo tipo para cubrir las exigencias de sus curiosos clientes.

Este préstamo le permitirá a John mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes, incrementar su utilidad, darle sostenibilidad a su negocio y sobre todo diversificar su oferta de licores a los clientes.
texts.en:
This is John, a resident of Medellín. He has a bar that has an ideal ambiance for adults who like music such as boleros and romantic songs of old that make the heart weep. 

John works with an employee. He serves the drinks and runs the cash register and she is the waitress in charge of filling the customers' drink orders.

John was married once but due to differences with his wife, they are now separated. He didn't have any children and thanks to this he is able to put all of his energy and savings into his dream, which is to own his own home. He is tired of paying rent and he is seeking something stable, a warm home where he can go every night for peace.

John needs for his business to sell more, attract more people, hold events, and offer good prices. That is why he wants to ask for a loan to buy liquors in large quantities to stock his business. He will have all kinds of liquor to cover the demands of his curious customers.

This loan will allow John to improve his sales, increase his customers, increase his profits, make his business sustainable, and above all, diversify his selection of liquor for his customers.

loans.use: to diversify his selection of liquor for his customers by buying different brands and wines

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es:
Luchadora, emprendedora, capaz, autosuficiente son las palabras que mejor describen a esta gran mujer llamada Beatriz, una madre cabeza de familia que se separó de su esposo quedando con dos hijas, no se colocó a llorar, no pidió lastima, de inmediato busco la manera de cómo mantenerla, inicio con la venta de mercancía ambulante y ahora tiene una gran tienda de variedades donde oferta servicios de fotocopia, impresión, vende artículos de papelería, tarjetas decorativas, peluches, chocolates entre otros. 

Ese espíritu de comerciante lo heredo de sus padres quienes también son personas independientes con negocio, aprendió mucho de ellos y mira ahora tiene un local propio con buen surtido y quiere seguir creciendo. 

Beatriz levando a su familia sola, ahora quiere brindarle la oportunidad a sus hijas para que estudien, les pagara la matricula debe apretarse un poco en el presupuesto pero vale la pena si eso hace feliz a sus hijas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido para mejorar la venta de peluches, cartas memorativas, globos y accesorios, por ello todo el dinero solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de estos productos, ella es un cliente con muy buen hábito de pago.
texts.en:
Hardworking, entrepreneurial, capable, self-sufficient are the words that best describe this great woman named Beatriz, a mother, head of family who separated from her husband leaving her with two daughters. She did not mourn and did not ask for pity. Now she is searching for the way to support herself. She began selling merchandise on foot and now has a big variety store where she offers photocopy and printing services, stationery, decorative cards, stuffed animals, chocolates, among other items.

She inherited this merchant spirit from her parents who also are independent people when it comes to business. She learned a lot from them and now has her own store with good stock and she wants to keep growing.

Beatriz is leading her family alone. Now she wishes to provide educational opportunity to her daughters. She will pay for their tuition. She will have to tighten the budget a bit but it will be worth the pain if it makes her daughters happy.

She is requesting a loan to buy stock to improve sales of stuffed animals, memorial cards, balloons and accessories. For this, all of the money requested will be invested in the purchase of those products. She is a customer with good repayment habits.

loans.use: to buy stock to improve the sale of stuffed animals, memorial cards, balloons and accessories.

loans.name: Maria Aurora

texts.es:
Ella es María es una mujer de 43 años de edad responsable y servicial que genera el sustento para su hogar gracias a su almacén de miscelánea donde oferta accesorios y ropa para mujer y hombre.

Su negocio empezó en el año 2008 guiada por un enorme deseo de sacar su familia adelante. María es una orgullosa madre de tres hijos tiene dos hombres de 20 y 13 y la mujer de 18 años de edad, ellos viven con ella, depende de los ingresos de sus padres, Tanto María como su pareja quieren que se concentren en el estudio para que sean unos grandes profesionales.

Maria quiere solicitar un préstamo el cual quiere destinar para complementar los productos que oferta en su negocio, invertirá en la compra de calzado y productos de papelería, tendrá un negocio muy completo y variado que de seguro ayudara a atraer clientes nuevos y mejorar sus ventas que servirán mucho para su propósito central que es comprar una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
This is María, 43 years old, a responsible and helpful woman who generates the sustenance for her home thanks to her variety store where she sells accessories and clothing for women and men. 

Her business began in 2008, guided by an enormous desire to get her family ahead. María is a proud mother of three children. She has two boys, ages 20 and 13 and an 18-year-old girl. They live with her, and depend on their parents' income. Both María and her partner want them to focus on school so that they can be great professionals. 

María wants to ask for a loan which she wants to use to complement the products that she sells in her business. She will invest in the purchase of footwear and paper goods. She will have a very complete and varied business which surely will help to attract new customers and improve her sales, which will serve greatly for her main goal which is to purchase their own home.

loans.use: to purchase footwear and paper goods.

loans.name: Jose Caludio

texts.es:
José es un joven independiente luchador, perseverante, vive en un hogar que el mismo construyo junto con su pareja e hijo de 3 años de edad, se dedica a la cría de cerdos y pollos, aprendió todos los conocimientos de sus padres, pero desde pequeño mostro ser un chico independiente que quería alcanzar sus propias metas.

Pagar la educación de su hijo, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, mejorar la estabilidad económica de su hogar son los objetivos principales y a lo que le apunta José con su negocio, conforme va pasando el tiempo va ganando terreno en la venta de pollos y cerdos, y es el mismo tiempo el encargado de decirle en que momento debe aumentar su producción para elevar sus ingresos y ese tiempo es ahora, por ello José quiere solicitar su ayuda para invertir en la compra de pollos + alimento, con el dinero que gane extra iniciara reparaciones en su hogar.
texts.en: José is a young, independent and persistent fighter. He lives in a home that he built himself with his wife and 3 year old son. He makes a living raising pigs and chickens. He learned all of the knowledge from his parents, but since he was little he showed that he was an independent boy that wanted to reach his own goals. His main objectives, and what drives him to his business, are to pay his son's education, improve his home's conditions, and improve the economic stability of his house. As time passes, he is gaining ground with selling chickens and pigs. It is time for the manager to tell him when he should increase his production to elevate his income and that time is now. For that reason, José wants to ask for help to invest in the purchase of chickens and feed. With the extra money that he earns, he will begin repairs on his home.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed.

loans.name: Dagoberto Maanuel

texts.es:
Dagoberto es una persona humilde, sencilla, trabajadora, vive en la zona de Momil un terreno difícil de vivir debido a las pocas oportunidades de empleo y los problemas de inclusión social que hay en la zona, sin embargo hay esta siempre Dagoberto con su cría de cerdos luchando por darle a su familia el mejor futuro posible, tiene 3 hijos dos menores de edad y una mayor, que ellso tenga alimento y tenga oportunidades de progresar sería lo ideal para él, generar buenos ingresos salir de la pobreza y mudarse de barrio es su gran sueño. 

Dagoberto quiere solicitar un pequeño aliento económico para la compra de alimento de engorde para sus cerdos.
texts.en:
Dagoberto is a humble, simple, hardworking person who lives in the Momil area. It's a hard place to live as there are few work opportunities as well as problems fitting in socially. However, Dagoberto is working hard raising pigs to provide his family with the best possible future. He has three young children and an adult daughter. To provide them with food and opportunities to make progress would be his ideal, his dream, as well as generating enough income to get out of poverty and move from the neighbourhood.

Dagoberto is seeking a little bit of economic help to buy food for the pigs he is fattening.

loans.use: buy food for the pigs he is fattening

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es:
Rafael es un hombre de 32 años de edad, vive solo con su hija y se dedica a la cría de aves y cerdos, es residente de la zona de Momil un sector donde el emprendimiento es el camino hacia el éxito ya que no hay muchas posibilidades de emplearse en algún trabajo, Rafael se encuentra solicitando un préstamo la razón es que necesita abastecer sus cocheras, no cuenta con capital para comprar cerdos, el préstamo sería para invertirlo en cerdos + alimento.

La importancia de este préstamo no solo es la necesidad, es brindarle la oportunidad a un porcicultor de desarrollar su profesión y que con su propio esfuerzo y sudor luche por un mejor futuro para él y su hija.
texts.en: Rafael is a 32 year old man. He lives with his daughter and makes a living raising birds and pigs. He is a resident of the area of Momil, a neighborhood where entrepreneurship is the road to success since there are not many possibilities to be employed in a job. Rafael is asking for a loan, reason being that he needs to stock his garage. He does not have money to buy pigs. The loan will be used to invest in pigs and feed. The importance of this loan isn't just need, it is to offer a hog farmer the opportunity to develop his profession. With his own effort and sweat he can fight for a better future for himself and his daughter.

loans.use: to invest in pigs and feed.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es:
Tener mejor calidad de vida, ser útil, que los hijos estudien, que en su mesa nunca falte alimento son los motivos que llevaron a Lina una mujer de la zona rural de tan solo 24 años de edad a iniciar con su negocio de cría de cerdos, un negocio que le ha ayudado mucho no solo a variar sus actividades como ama de casa si no a brindar un hogar más estable económicamente para ella, su pareja y sus dos hijos de 8 y 2 años de edad.

Lina quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de concentrado + salvado, este préstamo lo necesita ya que sus cerdos apenas están en etapa de crecimiento, no están para la venta y necesita alimentarlos para que engorde y sean sanos.
texts.en:
To have a better standard of living, to be useful, to have educated children, to always have enough to eat are what motivated Lina, a 24-year old woman from the countryside, to start her own business raising pigs. The business has helped her a great deal, not only to add variety to her work as a housewife but also to provide her household with a more stable income. She has a husband and two children aged 8 and 2.

Lina is seeking a loan to buy specialised feed and bran. She needs the loan as the pigs are still growing and are not yet ready for sale. They need food so they get fat and healthy.

loans.use: to buy specialised feed and bran

loans.name: Jose Alirio

texts.es:
En el año 1985 inicio su camino como independiente el señor José, una persona luchadora y trabajadora que años antes había sido empleado en talleres de mecánica, pero al ser una persona inteligente y con mente ganadora se quedó solo hasta tener las capacidades suficientes para montar su negocio. 

Al volverse una persona independiente comienzo a llover las buenas noticias, su negocio era exitoso, daba para el sostenimiento, se casó y tuvo dos hijos ya hoy en día mayores de edad.

José trabaja 11 horas diarias, su negocio está ubicado en la zona rural, sus ingresos son muy variables, depende mucho de las épocas, donde hay fechas especiales es donde mayores ingresos generan pues viajan muchas personas y algunas de ellas necesitan de sus servicios como mecánico.

José quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una herramienta indispensable que es un soldador de aluminio, antes tenía que prestarlo o alquilarlo pero con el préstamo tendrá su herramienta y ser aun dinero que se puede ahorrar e invertirlo en el pago del crédito mientas termina de pagarlo a partir de esto será ganancia neta para José.
texts.en: In 1985, José began his independent journey. A fighter and a hard worker, he had been employed in mechanic workshops years before, but, being an intelligent person with a winning mindset, he remained alone until he was able to start his business. When he became independent, the good news started to rain down and his business became successful, providing enough to sustain him. He married and had two children, now grown. José works 11 hours a day. His business is located in the rural zone, and his income is variable, very dependent on the times of year: he generates the most income around the holidays, because many people travel and some of them need his services as a mechanic. José wants to apply for a loan for the purchase of an indispensible tool: an aluminum soldering iron. Before, he had to borrow or rent one, but with the loan, he will have his own and make money which can be saved and invested in the repayment of the loan while he finishes paying it off; thereafter, the money will be net gains for José.

loans.use: Buy an aluminum soldering iron

loans.name: Asbel Leandro

texts.es:
Asbel es uno de los miles orgullosos campesinos que se encarga de cultivar el alimento que disfruten múltiples familias en Antioquia, se dedica al cultivo de frutas las cuales vende directamente en la plaza de mercado. Asbel vive junto con su pareja, ella se encarga de las labores domésticas, mientras que Asbel pasa 9 horas en los terrenos arando y abonando los cultivos para tener una cosecha abundante y de calidad. 

Asbel sueña con tener grandes campos de cultivos, tener 5 mil palos de aguacate, más que un sueño es un proyecto a 5 años, se siente motivado con este reto que se puso y dará todo de él para cumplirlo.

Asbel en el momento se encuentra en época de sostenimiento de cultivos, el insumo principal que necesita para realizar un adecuado trabajo es abonos y ya acabo con su existencia por ende quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de abonos en cantidades.

Apoya a este orgulloso agricultor, un voto de confianza por él es asegurar la continuidad de este profesión tan importante para el ciclo de vida humano.
texts.en:
Asbel is one of the thousands of proud country people who are in charge of growing food that multiple families in Antioquia enjoy. He is dedicated to growing fruit which he sells directly in the market square. Asbel lives alongside his spouse. She is in charge of the household work while Asbel spends nine hours on the land plowing and fertilizing the crops to have an abundant and good quality harvest.

Asbel dreams of having large fields of crops and to have five thousand avocado trees. More than a dream, it's been a project of five years. He feels motivated by this goal and will give his all to achieve it.

Asbel currently finds himself in the season of sustaining crops. The main input that he needs to perform adequate work is fertilizer which he's run out of so he wishes to request a loan to buy fertilizer in quantities.

Support this proud farmer. A vote of confidence for him is to assure the continuity of this profession so important for the cycle of human life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre soltero de 49 años de edad, inicio en el año 2010 con un negocio de venta de comida en el cual ha podido no solo mantener su hogar si no ir poco a poco reconstruyendo, desde crear divisiones, construir en material (concreto y adobe) y su idea es ir poco a poco ahorrando y remodelar lo que este a su alcance, su próximo proyecto es revocar su hogar, pintarlo, poner baldosa, 

Francisco a pesar de ser un hombre soltero, tiene una responsabilidad el mantenimiento de su hijo de 18 años, se comprometió con ella a que pagara su educación siempre y cuando ella marchara bien, se comprometieron a ganar las materias y apoyara mucho a su madre.

Francisco quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de un fogón, de un molino eléctrico y surtido para vender comidas rápidas, en su negocio no solo trabaja él, tiene dos puestos de ventas extras, genera dos empleos y su proyección es ir abarcando poco a poco   barrios vecinos.
texts.en:
Francisco is a single man, 49 years old. In 2010, he began with a business selling food, with which he has been able not only to support his household, but also to rebuild his house little by little, from creating divisions to building in strong material (concrete and adobe), and his idea is to save little by little and remodel what is in his reach. His next project is to plaster his house, paint it, and install floor tiles.

Fransico, despite being a single man, has the responsibility to support his 18-year-old child. He promised her that he would pay for her education as long as she was doing well. They committed to earn the material and he supports her mother a lot. 

Francisco wants to ask for a loan to purchase a stove with an electric mill and supplies to sell fast food. In his business, he doesn't work alone. He has two other sales points, he generates two jobs and his plan is to continue expanding little by little into nearby neighborhoods.

loans.use: to purchase a stove, with an electric mill and supplies to sell fast food.

loans.name: Ana Milena

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 36 años de edad, tiene un negocio de cría de aves, pero trabajo por un gran motivo salir adelante, dejar de ser pobre, cambiar la mentalidad de conformismo que tiene, es madre de tres hijas y no quiere que estén criando hijos y viviendo a la espalda de un hombre, su deseo es que san independientes y se valgan por ellas mismas y piensa hacerlo brindándoles la mejor herramienta disponible a su alcance la cual es la educación, ser constante para que estudien y se capaciten para afrontar los caminos de la vida. 

Ana vive junto con su esposo, su actividad principal es la cría y engorde de aves y con el capital que genera piensa invertirlo todo en sus retoños que aún están muy jóvenes tan solo tienen 14, 9 7 años de edad, son el futuro de su familia y espera que se conviertan en las primera generación que asista a una entidad universitaria.

Ana quiere solicitar un préstamo parta la compra de pollos, alimento, construir bebederos, comederos, materiales para arreglo y construcción de galpón principalmente madera, el apoyo ayuda a optimizar su negocio y cumplir con las normas de calidad que exigen algunas empresas para poder comprar pollos en cantidades.
texts.en:
36-year old Ana raises poultry so she can get ahead in life, stop being poor, and break away from her current life. She has three daughters and is pleased she is raising girls who will not be dependent on a man. Her wish is for them to be independent and value themselves. She hopes to provide them with the best tool possible: education. She hopes too that they will study hard and take courses so they do well on the road ahead.

Ana lives with her husband. Her job is raising and fattening poultry. She plans to spend all the money she earns on her children who are 14, 9, and 7 years old. They are the future and she hopes they become the first generation in her family to have a university education.

Ana is seeking a loan to buy chickens and feed, and to build water and food troughs. She also wishes to buy materials, mostly wood, to repair and build a barn. The money will help her improve her business and reach the quality standards required by businesses dealing with large numbers of poultry.

loans.use: buy chickens, feed, and materials to build water and feeding troughs, and repair and build a barn.

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es:
Jhon Jairo es un hombre de 30 años de edad que se dedica a la cría de cerdos gracias a este negocio puede mantener a su familia que la conforman su pareja y tres hijos dos hombres de 7 y 2 y la niña de 4 años de edad.

Jhon Jairo siempre ha producido y ha vendido lo mismo, nunca se preguntó qué pasaría si invirtiera en su negocio y tuviera más animales, gracias a un estudio que le realizaron los asesores se determinó que tenía la capacidad para tener más animales y los clientes que le compren.

En base a este análisis Jhon quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una cerda de cría + alimento.
texts.en:
Jhon Jairo is a 30-year-old man who works raising pigs.  Thanks to this business he is able to support his family, which consists of his wife and three children—two boys, ages 2 and 7, and a four-year-old girl.

Jhon Jairo has always produced and sold the same thing.  He has never asked himself what would happen if he would invest in his business and have more animals.  Thanks to a study that the assessors did for him, he determined that he had the capacity to have more animals and customers to buy them.

Based on this analysis, Jhon wants to ask for a loan to buy a pig to raise, and also animal feed.

loans.use: to buy a piglet and feed to increase his production

loans.name: Merlis Rosa

texts.es:
Merlis una campesina, criada con las buenas costumbres y valores del campo, una persona trabajadora que da todo de sí pro el beneficio de su familia que a pesar de ser una ama de casa y cuidar a tres hijos educándolos, advirtiéndoles de las consecuencias de un embarazo, que pueden dejar de gozar su juventud y frenar su progreso solo pro cuidar al niño, es también una comerciante su actividad principal es el comercio de aves, ellas las cría las engorda y posteriormente las vende.

Gracias a las ganancias que genera su empresa, esta familia se permite soñar con una mejor calidad de vida, conque sus hijos estudien, se prepares y se capaciten como todos unos profesionales y sean exitosos, gracias a sus ganancias pueden disfrutar de un buen alimento Gracias a Merlis su familia puede sale adelante.

Merlis quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar 300 kilos de Maíz, con esto tendrá existencia suficiente para alimentar sus aves por un buen periodo de tiempo.
texts.en:
Merlis is a country girl, raised with the good customs and values of the country.  She is a hard-working person who gives her all for the good of her family.   In spite of being a housewife and caring for and educating three children, warning them of the consequences of a pregnancy which could make them leave behind their joyful youth and stop their progress in order to care for a child, she is also a tradeswoman.  Her main job is selling birds.  She raises them, fattens them, and later sells them.

Thanks to the earnings that her business generates, this family is able to dream of a better quality of life in which her children study, prepare themselves, and ready themselves to be successful professionals.  Thanks to her earnings they can enjoy good food.  Thanks to Merlis, her family can get ahead.

Merlis wants to ask for a loan to buy 300 kilos of corn.  With this she will have enough supply to feed her birds for a good period of time.

loans.use: to buy 300 kilos of corn for the feeding of her chickens during a semester

loans.name: Jean Bosco

texts.en:
Jean Bosco is 35 years old. He is married with 2 children aged 8 and 10 years and they all go to school. He is a farmer and he has been growing maize for the past 8 years. His wife is a business woman. With the loan from Kiva, he would like to pay the workers who harvested his maize. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees of her children and to buy a piece of land.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay the workers who harvested his maize.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie aged 50 years. She is married with 5 children aged between 12 and 22 years.  They all go to school. She is a farmer and she has been growing maize for the past 8 years. Also her husband is a farmer. With the loan from Kiva, she would like to pay the workers who harvested maize. The profits from the business will be used to increase her welfare and to increase her savings.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay the workers who harvested her maize.

loans.name: Celestin

texts.en:
Celestin is 45 years old. He is married with 4 children aged 13 and 21 years. They all go to school. He is a farmer and he has been growing maize for the past 8 years. His wife is a business woman. With the loan from Kiva, he would like to pay the workers who harvested his maize. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees of his children and to buy medical insurance .

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay the workers who harvested his maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay wokers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Jean Pierre

texts.en:
Jean Pierre is 42 years old. He is married with 3 children aged between 12 and 25 years and they all go to school. He is a farmer and he has been growing maize for the past 3 years. His wife is a business woman. With the loan from Kiva, he would like to pay the workers who harvested his maize. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees of his children and to pay medical insurance.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay the workers who harvested his maize.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is 52 years old woman, and mother of five children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her son is vegetable seller by profession, e.g. cauliflowers, lady fingers, simla mirch (green peppers)  etc. Her son is responsible to feed the entire family and manage house hold.

Rukhsana's son needs to purchase different types of vegetables for reselling purpose so that he can increase the size of business, improve his sales growth and earn maximum profit. But due to unfavorable financial position her son is not in a position to purchase extra vegetables.

Therefore Rukhsana has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. 
She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her son's vegetable business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease more land to increase production of bananas

loans.name: Rakhshanda

texts.en:
Rakhshanda is a 40 year old, married woman. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. Some years ago she started her business of tailoring and running her household activities. At this time, Rakhshanda is working hard to continually provide income for her family's everyday expenses. 

She is now requesting a loan to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors for sewing more dresses to get a boost in her earnings. Rakhshanda wishes to spend her earnings on providing a quality life for her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors for sewing more dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Julienne

texts.en:
Julienne is 59 years old. She is married and has three children between 20 and 30 years old. One of them goes to school. 

She sells clothes and has been in a business for 20 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more women's clothes to sell. 

The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption, and she plans to make savings for a better future.

loans.use: To buy more women's clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetic products for her son's salon.

loans.name: Gulash

texts.ru: Гулаш погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Благодаря полученному кредиту и неустанному труду и выдержке Гулаш, на сегодняшний день она получает ежемесячную прибыль в сумме примерно 15,000 сом (KGS) от полеводческой деятельности и реализации экологически чистого молока. В хозяйстве у Гулаш на сегодня имеется 3 коровы. На 2,0 Га земли она выращивает клевер. В целях увеличения поголовья скота Гулаш обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), часть среств направит на обработку земли. На доходы от кредита Гулаш планирует и дальше развивать свой бизнес, а также приобрести бытовую технику, которая очень поможет по хозяйству, и отложит средства на подготовку к школе любимого внука.
texts.en:
Gulash paid off her previous loan and is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her financially. Thanks to both the loan amount and to her tireless effort and endurance, she receives a monthly income of about 15,000 KGS from her agricultural work and the sale of organic milk. She currently has three cows on her farm as well as 2.0 hectares of land where she grows clover. 

With the goal of increasing her head count of livestock, Gulash has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS, a portion of which will go toward land cultivation. She plans to use profits from the loan to further develop her business and also to acquire household appliances that will help her very much with the farm. She will also put money toward preparing her favourite grandchild for school.

loans.use: to purchase some livestock and to cultivate her land in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Ghinwa

texts.en: Ghinwa is 26 years old, married and lives with her husband and one child. She works as a nurse and helps her husband, who owns a garage, to improve their lifestyle. Today, she is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l; to pay her daughter's school fees. She said that this loan will help her to make sure that her daughter completes the school year.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's school fees

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 35 years old, married, and supports a family of 5 members.  She has been operating a farm supply business in the area for the last 8 years, earning 6,000 KES per month.
 
Jane has applied for her first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to buy additional stock of fresh vegetables to sell and earn additional income. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children.  Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of fresh vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is thankful that she was granted a 20,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her General Store.  Through her earnings she is able to send her child to school and meet their daily living expenses. 

She would now like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan which she will use as her working capital to buy additional quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, rice noodles, and frozen foods which she will sell at retail.  She knows that additional items in her store will yield additional sales and thus increase her earnings.  The stable income from her store sustains her family's basic needs and pays for the education of her child.  She thanks God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to her. 

Gemma dreams of having a larger General Store to improve her income.  She prays for a quiet decent life.  Every week she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies .

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis.  A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners.  The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional grocery items and ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Jean Baptiste

texts.en:
Jean Baptiste is 42 years old, married, and the father of four children aged 12 and 17 years old. They all go to school. He is a farmer and has been growing maize for the past eight years. His wife is also a farmer. With a loan from Kiva, he would like to buy more fertilizer for his maize crop. He will use the profits from his business to buy a goat and to pay school fees for his children.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizer for his maze crop.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замира успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Благодаря упорному труду Замиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется корова и 10 овец. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. Также на 0,38 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячная прибыль от бизнес деятельности составляет более 17,000 сом (KGS). Замира вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 нетелей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита позволят Замире развить ее бизнес и построить сараи для скота.
texts.en: Zamira successfully repaid her loan, having used it for its intended purpose. She is grateful to the Kiva Fund and to everyone who helped to finance her. Thanks to Zamira's hard work, today she has a cow and ten sheep. She sells milk on a daily basis. She also grows barley on 0.38 hectares of her own and 1.0 hectare of rented land. The monthly profit from business activities is more than 17,000 som (KGS). Zamira has applied again to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy two heifers to increase the size of her herd. The proceeds of the loan will permit Zamira to develop her business and to build barns for her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase two heifers in order to increase her the size of her herd.

loans.name: Kukataa Unyonge Group

texts.en:
Luhanga (center) requested another loan to buy additional clothing to sell.  She is thankful for the opportunity to borrow again and plans to use her proceeds to support her family.  Her husband is currently unemployed, which makes her the sole provider for her family.  

Microloans greatly increase her ability to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, herbicides and fertilizers to expand his farm and earn more income so as to improve his family's living standards.

loans.name: Olimpia

texts.en:
Olimpia has been farming rice for 10 years. This business she learned because she used to raise 10 children. Most of them are now grown except for the youngest, who is 10 years old. 

Olimpia is asking a loan from CEVI to buy fertilizer. In the future, Olimpia plans to cultivate more land for possible expansion to increase profitability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene used the previous loan to buy cards, flash disks, and videotapes for her business to sell. She deals in a business of selling CDs, flash disks, memory cards, tapes and music. In addition to that, Irene sells local medicine that adds more money for her. She faces the challenge of competition that hinders growth of her business. Besides that, she hopes to invest a lot into her business so as to out-compete others. 

Irene has asked for another loan to buy business equipment like flash disks and videotapes for her business to sell.

loans.use: to buy business equipment like flash disks and videotapes for her business to sell.

loans.name: Wilkister

texts.en:
Wilkister is 55 years old, married and supports a family of six members. 

She has been in a retail business for the last seven years, earning KES 12,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to add more stock of charcoal for selling.

Wilkister plans to use the anticipated profits to repay her loan as well as stabilize her business. 

Her future hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to add more stock of charcoal for selling

loans.name: Remegious

texts.en: Remegious is 50 years old, married and lives with his five children in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer and grow crops like bananas, coffee and tomatoes, He also has a produce store that provides him with more income. He faces the challenge of little capital, which hinders expansion of his business. However, he is looking forward to having a healthy family and enough capital, and has asked for a loan to buy herbicides and spray his tomatoes.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and spray his tomatoes

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce used the previous loan to buy more fresh foods like tomatoes to sell. She sells fresh foods and, at the same time, owns a restaurant that adds extra income for her. She started these businesses with a hope of employing herself and earning an income for her family. 

She has future prospects of establishing a good hotel, and she intends to buy fresh foods like tomatoes, oranges, avocados and passion fruits to sell.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods like tomatoes, oranges, avocados and passion fruits to sell.

loans.name: Nelby Luz

texts.es:
Nelby es una humilde mujer que trabaja en la cocina de su hogar por mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, gracias a su abuela y aun madre aprendió a cómo realizar unas exquisitas galletas, pero solo hasta el año 2013 se dio cuenta que esta receta podía ser una excelente idea para iniciar un negocio de venta de galletas y panes. 

Nelby tiene dos  hijos el mayo de 8 y la bebe de tan solo 1 añito de edad, la mentalidad que tenía antes era trabajar para sobrevivir, que sus hijos aprendieran a hacer panes y que vendieran junto con ella, ahora gracias a un amigo y a Interactuar esta mujer cree en un futuro donde viva cómodamente, donde sea exitosa y le inculcara a sus hijos la importancia del estudio que no se pierdan en el campo, que cojan malos pasos o se vuelvan una personas asalariaras, quiere que sean un ejemplo para la vereda y trabajara mucho en ello, por eso es tan importante ahora su negocio pues los ingresos están siendo destinados para la compra de libros, útiles escolares de sus pequeños.

Nelby para mejorar y potenciar su negocio quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar maquinaria e insumos para realizar sus panes en mayor cantidad y en menor tiempo, comprara un caldero, estufa, cilindro, harina y azúcar.
texts.en:
Nelby is a humble woman who works from the kitchen in her home in order to improve her living conditions. Thanks to her grandmother and mother she learned how to bake delicious biscuits, but it was only in 2013 that she realised that this recipe could be an excellent starting point to build a business selling biscuits and breads.

Nelby has two children; the oldest is 8 years old and the baby is only 1 year old. She used to have the mentality that one works to survive and that her children would learn to make breads too and sell them together with her. Whereas now, thanks to a friend and to the field partner Interactuar this woman is building a future for herself where she can live comfortably, where she can be successful and teach her children the importance of studies is not lost in the countryside. Whether they take a different path or enter employment, she wants them to be an example to the village and she is putting a lot of work into this. For this reason, her business is so important now because the earnings are being set aside for the purchase of books and school supplies for her little children. 

In order to improve and develop her business Nelby is requesting a loan to buy machinery and supplies to make her breads on a larger scale in less time. She will buy a cooking pot, stove, rolling cylinder, flour and sugar.

loans.use: to buy machinery and supplies to make bread (cooking pot, stove, rolling cylinder, flour and sugar).

loans.name: Reyan

texts.en:
This woman's name is Reyan. She is widowed, 57 years old, and a resident of Imus, Cavite, Philippines. She has dedicated her life to raising her children and works hard to provide income for their daily sustenance.

Reyan has a direct selling business. She sells undergarments, cosmetics and other products through popular direct selling brands like Avon and Natasha. Dealers buy the products at a lower price than that shown in the customer catalogue and sell them at a profit. Reyan's regular customers are her neighbors, friends, family and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 3500 in sales every week.

To help her sustain her business, she is requesting a Php 60000 loan which she will use to buy merchandise items and orders of beauty products, footwear, clothing, toiletries and undergarments for her growing number of customers. Filipinos prefer to buy these branded personal goods for their good quality. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment and for the financial help that will be given to her.   

Reyan aims to open a store for her products to attract more customers. She dreams of having her own house. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay micro finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for direct-selling products like beauty products, soaps, cologne, shampoo, lotion and whitening creams.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow and dairy feed, which she hopes will enable her to get more milk to sell and make more income to support her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts for service and maintenance

loans.name: Sharlene

texts.en:
Nothing can stop a person who is determined to succeed. 

Here is Sharlene, a 33-year-old mother who is married to Ronilo. They reside at Pasay City, Philippines, and all along, they have been working as one to build their family. Ronilo works as a baker, and Sharlene helps her husband by managing a small buying and selling business. 

Sharlene often sells different clothing materials like shirts and dresses for men and women. Since then, what income they get from the enterprise became a great relief for the household expenditures. 

She would like to improve this more. But there's a main hindrance: financial incapability. With this, she would like to ask a request from you. She is seeking a PHP 12,000 loan that she will maximize in buying more quantities of clothes that she will sell. 

Yours now is the chance to empower a woman like her with a dream. Someday, she hopes to widen her inventory, and she prays for good health to always be with her family.

loans.use: to acquire more quantities of clothes that she will sell.

loans.name: Orozgul

texts.ru: Орозгул погасила свой кредит, она безгранично благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто откликнулся и помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Орозгул на сегодняшний день имеется лошадь, 5 коров и 12 овец. На 2,20 Га собственной и 0,56 Га арендованной земли она выращивает арбузы, кукурузу, перец, помидоры и рис. Прибыль от ведения бизнеса составляет 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Все накопленные средства стараются вкладывать в скот. Орозгул вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Орозгул планирует доходы от кредита вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, она по-прежнему мечтает накопить на постройку дома для ее семьи.
texts.en: Orozgul repaid her loan. She is infinitely grateful to the Kiva Fund and to everyone who responded and helped to finance her. Today Orozgul has a horse, five cows and twelve sheep. She grows watermelons, corn, peppers, tomatoes, and rice on 2.2 hectares of her own land and 0.56 hectares of rented land. The profit from running the business is 15,000 som (KGS) per month. She tries to invest all of her accumulated funds in livestock. Orozgul has again applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. Orozgul plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business, and as before she dreams of saving up to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Neimer Alexander

texts.es:
Neimer es un joven de 28 años de edad, padre de dos pequeñas de 7 y 5, se dedica a la cría de cerdos, fue criado bajo el seno de una familia humilde, donde le inculcaron que la honestidad, el trabajo y la humildad son los ejes son las bases para ser una excelente persona, Neimer se dedica a la cría de cerdos una actividad que aspira en un futuro heredárselo a sus hijas.

Actualmente cuenta con 5 cerdos, pero se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar 1 cerda de cría y 4 lechones, si realiza esta inversión estaría aprovechando todo el espacio disponible en sus cocheras aparte de que tendrá mas animales para mejorar su ingresos y aumentar la calidad de vida de su familia que depende de los ingresos que genere Neimer.

Apoya a este empresario porcicultor que busca generar esperanzas de progreso de una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Neimer, 28, is a father to two young children of 7 and 5 and he makes a living raising pigs. He grew up in the bosom of a humble family where he was taught that honesty, work and humility are the foundations of becoming a great person. 

Neimer works raising pigs which is a profession he hopes to leave to his daughters in the future. Currently, he has 5 pigs but he is requesting a loan in order to buy 1 breeding pig and 4 piglets. If he manages to obtain this investment he would be taking advantage of all the available space he has in his pigsties but with more animals to increase his earnings and  improve the quality of life of his family who depend on all of Neimer’s generated earnings. 

Support this pigfarmer entrepreneur who has hopes of providing a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy 1 pig and 4 piglets.

loans.name: Je Ye Se Kola Group

texts.fr: Fatoumata est une malienne âgée de 58 ans. Son niveau à l’école est la 5e fondamentale. Elle est de teint clair avec un bouton noir sur le visage à côté de l’oeil droit. Mariée, elle est mère de 6 enfants dont trois garçons et trois filles. Une seule fille fait l’école. Elle est en 9e année fondamentale et a 16 ans. Ménagère, son mari est un cultivateur. Comme elle a pu s’acheter un bœuf avec ses économies antérieures son rêve est de s’acheter un autre bœuf et une charrue pour ses enfants afin de garantir leur avenir dans l’agriculture et avec comme espoir le prêt qu’elle prend au R M C R. C’est la femme qui tient les cordes du bélier et la chèvre sur la photo. Elle prend le prêt au RMCR pour acheter des chèvres et moutons pour l’élevage. Elle s’approvisionne au marché environnant et vend au même marché après l’engraissement. Le bénéfice récolté sur la vente des chèvres et moutons la permet de prendre en charge : la santé, la nourriture et l’habillement de ses enfants ; cela pour un bénéfice moyen de 5000f fcfa par mois. Elle déclare n’avoir pas eu de problème avec le prêt du RMCR. Elle compte s’encourager dans son activité d’élevage et faciliter l’agriculture afin de satisfaire suffisamment sa vie et celle des membres de sa famille.
texts.en:
Fatoumata is 58 years old and comes from Mali.  She completed five years of schooling.  She is seen in the photo holding a sheep and a goat.  She has pale skin and a beauty mark next to her right eye.  Fatoumata is married and has six children, three boys and three girls.  Only one of her daughters attends school.  She is sixteen years old and is completing her ninth year of education.

Fatoumata looks after her house and her husband is a farmer.  In the past, she managed to buy a cow with money that she saved.  In the future, she would like to do this again, and also buy a cart to give her children a better future in agriculture.  This is why she has requested a loan from the field partner, RMCR, to buy sheep and goats to raise and sell on.  Fatoumata buys and sells her animals at a local market.  Her profits, which average 5,000 francs CFA a month, will pay for healthcare, food and clothing for her children.

Fatoumata would like to continue in livestock raising so she can meet her needs and the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats to raise and sell on.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm to get more farm produce to sell

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en: Rosalinda is 39 years old and  from Trinidad, Bohol. She is married with three children who are still dependents. They are ages 3, 12 and 15. Rosalinda owns a sari-sari (general) store. She started this business just three months ago. She is asking for a loan to buy canned goods, noodles, chips, candies, toiletries, seasoning, soft drinks, beer and liquor. In the future, she plans to make a mini-grocery type of store to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, chips, candies, toiletries, seasoning, soft drinks, beer and liquor for her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add more stock and put up a stable stall.

loans.name: Brian

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Brian works hard to support his family.

He has a buy-and-sell cashew nuts business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Brian is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to  purchase additional sacks of cashew nuts to sell in his buy-and-sell cashew nuts business.

Brian  has been sustaining his business activities through his past 17 loans from NWTF. He hopes that his hard work will help him attain his dream to build and expand his business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of cashew nuts to sell

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer works hard to support her family. Jennifer is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, soft drinks, soap, chips, eggs, etc.

Jennifer has been in this business for five years now. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business. 

In the future, Jennifer would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, soft drinks, soap, chips, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase energy-saving stoves and solar lights at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Rafiki Group

texts.en:
Furaha (far left) has a dream to expand her business further; this is why she returned to Wezesha Project for another loan after she repaid her last in full and on time. 

Her last loan helped her to increase her stock, and this loan will build upon that, as she buys large quantities of rice, sugar and other goods to sell and increase her profit. She will reinvest her profits in her business, and pay for her children's school fees and adequate food for her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar and other goods for sale.

loans.name: Arcesio

texts.es:
El señor Arcesio no pudo escoger mejor lugar para tomarse la foto, atrás de él se encuentra su inspiración un negocio de un amigo de tienda de abarrotes en cual trabajo y sabe cómo empezó este negocio y lo que es ahora, por ello Arcesio quiere dejar de ser un empelado quiere crear su negocio y la idea es solicitar un préstamo para cumplir su sueño, hace esto por superación personal, por tener una vida digna, por pensar en el futuro de sus dos hijos de 2 y 11 años de edad.

Arcesio quiere solicitar un préstamo para iniciar con un negocio de tienda de abarrotes, solo tiene el local, necesita comprar vitrinas, estanterías, congelador, nevera, surtido de granos, productos congelados, una pesa, abarrotes, víveres etc. etc.

Pero porque apoyar a Arcesio, vale la pena apoyarlo porque es un hombre entusiasta, alegre, que quiere crecer, pagar la educación de sus hijos, trabajar su propio local y generar una buena estabilidad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Arcesio could not have chosen a better place to have taken this photo, as behind him you can see his inspiration: his friend’s business which is the grocery store where he used to work. He knows how this business began and what it has become now, and for this reason Arcesio no longer wants to be an employee but he wants to build his own business.  He is requesting a loan in order to achieve his dream, and is doing this for reasons of self-improvement; he wants to have a respectable life and is thinking of the future of his two children who are 2 and 11 years old.

Arcesio is requesting a loan to set up a grocery store business. He only has the premises and he needs to buy shop windows, shelves, a freezer, a fridge, a range of grains, frozen products, scales, groceries and other supplies.
 
Why should you support Arcesio? It is worthwile funding Arcesio because he is an enthusiastic and happy man who wants to grow, pay for his children’s education, work in his own shop and generate a stable financial base for his family.

loans.use: to buy shop windows, shelves, a freezer, a fridge, a range of grains, frozen products, scales, groceries and other supplies for his new business.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 56 años de edad, padre de la asombrosa cantidad de 10 hijos, se encuentra actualmente sin empleo, para él es muy difícil esta situación tiene una números familia que mantener.

Ante situaciones difíciles, decisiones inteligentes, Francisco encontró en Interactuar un gran aliado y ahora quiere solicitar su primer préstamo para iniciar su negocio propio de venta de legumbres, en su casa tiene un espacio para realizar esta actividad, necesita comprar solo estanterías y surtido con eso será suficiente para iniciar.

Francisco quiere pedirles a todo que lo apoyen en un préstamo que se compromete a pagarlo puntualmente, el cual invertirá en la compra de estanterías y surtido de legumbres y frutas, tu ayuda será muy significativa le dará una herramienta de trabajo a un hombre que busca mantener y generar calidad de vida a un hogar conformado por su pareja y 10 hijos.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 56 year old man, the father of an astounding 10 children. He is currently unemployed which for him is a very difficult situation given the large sized family he has to support.

Facing difficult situations and intelligent decisions Francisco has found a good ally in Interactuar and now he wants to request a loan to star his own business selling vegetables. He has a space in his house for the business he jut needs to buy some shelving and enough stock to start.

Francisco wants to tell everyone that supports him with a loan that he promises to pay punctually. He will invest in buying shelves and a variety of vegetables and fruit.
